WorkPlace.Name: Hurrah Vikar ApS
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription: Hurrah er et vikarbureau med vikarerne i fokus. Vi er medlem af Dansk Erhverv og sikrer, at vores vikarer har styr på faget. Det er essentielt for os, at hele processen foregår glidende, uanset om du er en virksomhed eller jobsøgende.

HiringOrg.Name: Hurrah Vikar ApS
HiringOrg.OrganizationDescription: Hurrah er et vikarbureau med vikarerne i fokus. Vi er medlem af Dansk Erhverv og sikrer, at vores vikarer har styr på faget. Det er essentielt for os, at hele processen foregår glidende, uanset om du er en virksomhed eller jobsøgende.

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Warehouse work - day and evening - shifts with very competitive salary
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a minimum of 7 new warehouse employees for our customer in Vejle who can work independently, in a structured and efficient manner.
This is a long-term (3 months) temporary position with a potential to get permanently employed.

The work tasks can vary from emptying containers to Pick&Pack and driving forklift. 
Therefore we need workers with and without forklift certificate. 
Most of the work is done in cooling houses (5-7 degrees).

Professional skills:

  • You work in a structured and efficient manner
  • You can work independantly
  • You are careful and quality conscious
  • You are responsible and reliable

Personal characteristics:

  • You are motivated and get in on time
  • You are flexible in regards to working hours and tasks
  • You have no issues with working in a cooling house

The working hours are as follows:

06.00 - 14.00 or 16.00
16.00 - 00.00

Salary is very competitive.

You need safety shoes.

Application:

If you are interested, send us an application and CV to job@hurrahvikar.dk (please put in Vejle as subject in the mail) or call us at 2154 0967. Applications are processed on an ongoing basis and the job can therefore be filled before the deadline.

We are looking forward to hearing from you!
